tasks.title: Summarize
tasks.description: Summarize a given paragraph at varying lengths and styles.
templates:
Summarize the following text in {length} sentences for a {audience} audience:

"{source}"

Write a {length}-sentence summary of the text below, focusing on {focus}:

{source}

tasks.title: Translate
tasks.description: Translate text into another language with register instructions.
templates:
Translate the following passage into {lang} using a {register} register:

{source}

tasks.title: Explain
tasks.description: Explain a technical concept at different depths.
templates: Explain {concept} in a way a {audience} would understand. Keep it {depth}.

tasks.title: Extract
tasks.description: Structured extraction from a text (entities or Q/A).
